  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2901</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2901</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Find your way</string>
            <string language="en">Finding your way</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Finden Ihrer Methode</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trouver votre chemin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Encontrando sua maneira</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Individuazione del vostro modo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εύρεση του τρόπου σας</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva per practicar instruccions que s'utilitzen quan es demana com anar a un lloc i per dir com arribar-hi. Inclou petits diàlegs amb exemplificacions concretes i activitats interactives d'identificació i comprensió oral i escrita.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) on practising asking the way and following directions to go from one place to another. It includes short dialogues as examples, and interactive oral and written comprehension exercises to identify instructions and destinations.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua anglesa</string>
            <string language="en">English language</string>
            <string language="es">lengua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gramàtica</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="es">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comprensió oral</string>
            <string language="en">listening comprehension</string>
            <string language="es">comprensión oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comprensió lectora</string>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">símbol</string>
            <string language="en">symbol</string>
            <string language="es">símbolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ciutat</string>
            <string language="en">town</string>
            <string language="es">ciudad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">vocabulari</string>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
            <string language="es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit 
(SCHLAMM) auf dem Üben, um um die Methode bitten und Richtungen 
folgend, von einem Platz zu anderen zu gehen. Er schließt kurze
Dialoge als Beispiele ein, und interaktives Mund- und schriftliches 
Erfassen trainiert, um Anweisungen und Zieleinheiten zu kennzeichnen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) sur 
pratiquer demandant la voie et suivant des directions d'aller d'un 
endroit à l'autre. Il inclut des dialogues courts comme 
exemples, et la compréhension orale et écrite interactive s'exerce 
pour identifier des instructions et des destinations.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) em 
praticar pedindo a maneira e seguindo sentidos ir de um lugar a outro.
Inclui diálogos curtos como exemplos, e a compreensão oral e 
escrita interativa exercita para identificar instruções e destinos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) 
sull'esercitarsi chiedendo il modo e seguendo i sensi andare da un 
posto ad un altro. Include i dialoghi corti come esempi e la 
comprensione orale e scritta interattiva si esercita per identificare 
le istruzioni e le destinazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στην άσκηση
ζητώντας τον τρόπο και μετά από τις κατευθύνσεις να πάει από 
μια θέση σε άλλη. Περιλαμβάνει τα σύντομα διαλογικά 
παράθυρα για παραδείγματα, και τις διαλογικές προφορικές και 
γραπτές ασκήσεις κατανόησης για να προσδιορίσει τις οδηγίες και 
τους προορισμούς.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
